Chisa

Group (2022-present):
XG

Introduction

Kondou Chisa is a Japanese singer, dancer, model, and actress under XGALX. She is best known as the main vocalist, sub-leader and the oldest member of the Japanese global girl group XG.

Prior to joining XGALX, Chisa was active under Kansai Collection Entertainment as an actress and model. And rather than passing the audition, Chisa felt more of a conviction to blast through it. She said that she felt that her entire life had led her to that moment.

Chisa was revealed as XG's second member on January 30, 2022. The group made their debut on March 18 of the same year with their first song, "Tippy Toes".
